scripts.build-styles: node-sass --include-path scss ./frontend/scss/index.scss ./junk/bundle.css --output-style compressed && npx postcss ./junk/bundle.css --no-map --use autoprefixer -o ./style.css && rm ./junk/bundle.css && npm run hash-style
scripts.build-scripts: babel frontend/js/*.js --compact --presets=babel-preset-es2015 -o ./junk/build.js && browserify -p esmify ./junk/build.js -o ./junk/bundle.js && babel ./junk/bundle.js --presets=babel-preset-minify -o ./app.js --no-comments && rm ./junk/build.js ./junk/bundle.js && npm run hash-script
scripts.build: npm run build-styles && npm run build-scripts
